title: Australian Rules Football Game-Based Training Design: Intermediate Elementary Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Australian rules football rules comprehension and simple dribbling/passing techniques
context.additional_context: Game simulation training utilizing mobile devices and BYOD environments, focusing on recreating game conditions similar to actual competitions

learning_goals: Learners can make effective pass decisions within 5 seconds and with 90% accuracy when entering the attack zone (inside-50).
Learners can select passes under pressure scenarios (similar to real matches) with over 85% probability in game-based training.
Learners can complete over 20 simulation training sessions via a mobile app within a week and pass team project evaluations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
